ygData.subject: Re: Role/Anon/norm
ygData.msgSnippet: I use Roleplay all the time. I guess as a Rogue, no one ever really wants anything from me, so I don t think it s an issue of not wanting to help people. I
ygData.messageBody:
I use Roleplay all the time. I guess as a Rogue,
no one ever really wants anything from me, so I
don't think it's an issue of not wanting to help
people. I just think of it as more appropriate -- in real
life, people don't walk around with profession-tags to
announce what they do for a living, so in EQ I prefer to
let people guess. When I pop up out of nowhere, of
course, that's usually a clue, as is the puny little
dagger (Giant Snake Fang) I use. <br><br>Kharlisht of
Kaladim<br>11th level rogue<br>Drinal
